blog.name: domesticatedavengersdoingstuff
blog.title: This week on the Avengers
blog.description: Ever wondered what Marvel characters did in their daily lives? Be a lot cooler if ya did.  Come with Sass or don't come at all.

summary:
Stephen Strange: Do you ever see something and just like... your day is made? Like it’s just amazing? 
Tony, smiling: well...
body:
Stephen Strange: Do you ever see something and just like… your day is made? Like it’s just amazing?

Tony, smiling: well I-


Strange: that’s how I feel about this Chalupa from Taco Bell.

blog.name: ceasarslegion
blog.title: Millennials Are Broke Bc We Are Greedily Using Both Kidneys
blog.description: 20y/o, Canadian third culture kid studying too many things, those being a double major in PoliSci and Film as well as a minor in History. I dabble in both film and stage acting, and if all else fails I can guarantee myself a major role in the MCU by dyeing my hair blond and changing my name to Chris. MGS, Fallout + Elder Scrolls, Marvel and the McElroy brothers, mostly. Local Tony Stark and Peter Parker gremlin, but Starker shippers will be blocked whether you start shit with me or not, please perish.

blog.name: theincorrectavengers
blog.title: ⎊Incorrect Avengers Quotes⎊
blog.description:
Bailey • Canadian • Bisexual

Feel free to send me asks or prompts :)

https://myurls.co/theincorrectavengers

summary:
Peter: I’m the number one Tony Stark stan in the world!
Rhodey: that seems like a bit of a mouthful, Peter
Peter: it is, a...
body:
Peter: I’m the number one Tony Stark stan in the world!

Rhodey: that seems like a bit of a mouthful, Peter

Peter: it is, a little, but that’s okay

Rhodey: why don’t you shorten it?

Peter: what do you mean? Maybe Tony stan? Or Stark stan?

Rhodey: yeah, that’s a little better

Peter: I’ve got it! I’m the number one Tony Stanker in the world!

Rhodey: *barely containing his laughter*

Rhodey: th-thats perfect! Y-you should go tell him! He’ll love it!

[later]

Rhodey: *watching them in the living room*

Peter: mr. Stark! Guess what?!

Tony: you got into MIT?

Peter: no, better!

Tony: ????

Peter: I’m naming myself the number one Tony Stanker in the world!

Tony: *coughs out his coffee*

Rhodey: *bursts out laughing*

Tony: you little-!

Rhodey: *already running out of the room*

Peter: *extremely confused*

Peter: did I do something wrong?


@theincorrectavengers

Rhodey: *already running out of the room*

Peter: *extremely confused*

Peter: did I do something wrong?


@theincorrectavengers

title: Abscission

by lerums

Peter gets tonsillitis. His dads are there, always. It can very well be read as a standalone, although I advice reading it as part of the series!

blog.name: dracusfyre
blog.title: Anonymous Crow
blog.description: Frostiron, Winteriron, Stucky, and feminism. Sometimes Destiel. Mostly reblogs with a few original writing posts. Also history stuff, trivia...you know what, I don't even know.  Good luck.Banner by @massivespacewren, icon by my spawn

summary: Far From Home - dracusfyre - Marvel Cinematic Universe [Archive of Our Own]
title: Far From Home - dracusfyre - Marvel Cinematic Universe [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 5/8
Fandom: Marvel Cinematic Universe
Rating: Not Rated
Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
Relationships: James “Bucky” Barnes/Tony Stark
Characters: James “Bucky” Barnes, Tony Stark, Obadiah Stane, Peter Parker
Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Medieval, Fake/Pretend Relationship, Tumblr Prompt, Crusades, BAMF Tony Stark, BAMF Bucky Barnes
Summary:

Welcome to my trope mash-up, Medieval AU + Fake Dating, based on an anonymous request from Tumblr. Bucky, fleeing from the sinister organization of assassins known as Hydra, agrees to help kidnapped nobleman Tony get back to his home. Unfortunately, it turns out that fleeing the Holy Land while hiding from both Hydra and the Ten Rings was the easy part…

summary: TONY-CENTRIC MCU MARATHON IS ON!!! What: Tony Stark-centric movie stream is hosted once a week every week leading up to the...
body:
TONY-CENTRIC MCU MARATHON IS ON!!!

What: Tony Stark-centric movie stream is hosted once a week every week leading up to the premiere of Avengers: Endgame. We will watch one movie every week, so account for 2-2.5 hour long streams. The purpose is to rewatch the movies, relieve the best Tony moments, meet fellow fans, share the fun, share the feels, build up the hype. More info here.

When: Saturdays 8pm EST.

Some rules: This is a Tony-centric stream, no Tony bashing/negativity. As for other characters/ships/the plot/writing/directing, sharing one’s feelings is expected but try to keep the negativity to a minimum. This is an 18+ stream, meaning the viewers are welcome to explicit discussion/discussion of sexual themes. If you’re a minor/are uncomfortable with that, keep that in mind and take care of yourself.

2.5 HOURS TILL STREAM!! JOIN HERE

@rescueironman @kayytx @goose-danvers I’d appreciate a signal boost if you don’t mind

This is an 18+ stream, meaning the viewers are welcome to explicit discussion/discussion of sexual themes. If you’re a minor/are uncomfortable with that, keep that in mind and take care of yourself.

2.5 HOURS TILL STREAM!! JOIN HERE

@rescueironman @kayytx @goose-danvers I’d appreciate a signal boost if you don’t mind
trail.content:
TONY-CENTRIC MCU MARATHON IS ON!!!

What: Tony Stark-centric movie stream is hosted once a week every week leading up to the premiere of Avengers: Endgame. We will watch one movie every week, so account for 2-2.5 hour long streams. The purpose is to rewatch the movies, relieve the best Tony moments, meet fellow fans, share the fun, share the feels, build up the hype. More info here.

When: Saturdays 8pm EST.

Some rules: This is a Tony-centric stream, no Tony bashing/negativity. As for other characters/ships/the plot/writing/directing, sharing one’s feelings is expected but try to keep the negativity to a minimum. This is an 18+ stream, meaning the viewers are welcome to explicit discussion/discussion of sexual themes. If you’re a minor/are uncomfortable with that, keep that in mind and take care of yourself.

blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

summary: You Say Goodbye, I Say Hello
title: You Say Goodbye, I Say Hello
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2H0upLY

by Miryel

«Hai sentito? Parker se ne va.»
Quanto facevano male, le parole. Specie quando non avevano alcuna intenzione di ferire; e fu quasi incapace - per la prima volta da quando era venuto al mondo - di celare il suo sgomento. Avrebbe voluto fare tante di quelle domande in proposito, e ricevere le risposte che cercava, solo per non doversi abbassare a dover porgere quei quesiti proprio a Peter. Non avrebbe mai avuto il coraggio di mostrarsi anche solo un minimo colpito da quella notizia. Troppo orgoglio, ogni minuto più forte. Si stava rovinando la vita e il carattere e l'esistenza. Eppure non riusciva nemmeno a provarci, a cambiare. Nemmeno per qualcosa che, un tempo - e forse ancora - aveva significato il mondo, per lui.
[ Young!Tony x Peter - Angst/Introspettivo/Romantico ]

summary: Ok another ask! How do you feel about those few fans mad about Peter being "Another Ironman" because he got the suit and stuff...
question: Ok another ask! How do you feel about those few fans mad about Peter being "Another Ironman" because he got the suit and stuff he didn't "need"?
answer: I think that Tony’s suit kept Peter 100000000% more safe than he would be without it and we need to also remember: TONY DIDINT MAKE PETER’S WEB FLUID OR ANYTHING, he just gave Peter a better way to utilize what he already had

reblog.comment: I think that Tony’s suit kept Peter 100000000% more safe than he would be without it and we need to also remember: TONY DIDINT MAKE PETER’S WEB FLUID OR ANYTHING, he just gave Peter a better way to utilize what he already had

blog.name: itsagentromanoff
blog.title: Tiny Tony
blog.description: Non Avengers Quotes | #TeamTonyStark | Profile photo: Petite-Madame

summary: Tony: As a child, when faced with a dilemma, my Aunt Peggy  encouraged me to ask what would Jesus do? The answer to that was...
body:
Tony: As a child, when faced with a dilemma, my Aunt Peggy encouraged me to ask what would Jesus do? The answer to that was always love thy neighbour. But my neighbour had a toupee, so that wasn’t going to happen. But that’s why I changed it to, what would Spock do?

Bruce: Did you find that helpful?

Tony: Yes. Oh, for example, three years ago when I discovered Thor was eating all my Pop-Tarts, instead of getting angry or vindictive, you know, I got a floor safe.

Thor: I knew I could smell ’em.
